title: The Clever Design of Arcade Demo Screens

media:group.media:title: The Clever Design of Arcade Demo Screens
media:group.media:description:
Does watching a game play itself make you want to play? Yes. Here's a video why divined from simply watching Dig Dug play repeatedly while I wait for people to check the rules on spellcasting. 

Support me on Patreon - https://www.patreon.com/powerpak
Follow me on Twitter - https://twitter.com/JackWNicholls

Chapters - 
00:00 - Introduction
02:06 - Purpose 1: Teach
04:26 - Purpose 2: Learn
06:41 - Purpose 3: Taunt
10:10 - The Modern Equivalent
12:34 - FORBIDDEN

surprisingly, it is "dig dug", not "dig-dug". so is his first name dig and second dug? i've said dig dug so many times it sounds weird now...

#DigDug #RetroGaming #PowerPak
